summary.span: Provides the base class for a generic collection.

span.span: Provides the base class for a generic collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可以立即使用所建立的其中一個建構的類型執行個體，您只需要是指定要包含在集合中的物件類型。The class can be used immediately by creating an instance of one of its constructed types; all you have to do is specify the type of object to be contained in the collection. 此外，您可以從任何建構的型別，衍生您自己的集合型別或衍生的泛型集合類型類別本身。In addition, you can derive your own collection type from any constructed type, or derive a generic collection type from the class itself. 類別提供受保護的方法，可用於自訂其行為時加入和移除項目、 清除該集合，或將現有項目的值設定。The class provides protected methods that can be used to customize its behavior when adding and removing items, clearing the collection, or setting the value of an existing item. 大部分objectscan 修改。Most objectscan be modified. 不過，物件，以唯讀狀態初始化無法修改物件。However, a object that is initialized with a read-only object cannot be modified. 請參閱這個類別的唯讀版本。See for a read-only version of this class. 可以使用整數索引來存取此集合中的項目。Elements in this collection can be accessed using an integer index. 在此集合中的索引都以零為起始。Indexes in this collection are zero-based. 接受`null`參考有效的值類型，並允許重複的項目。 accepts `null` as a valid value for reference types and allows duplicate elements. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個範例示範數個屬性和方法類別。The first example demonstrates several properties and methods of the class. 第二個範例示範如何從建構類型的衍生集合類別，以及如何覆寫的受保護的方法提供自訂行為。The second example shows how to derive a collection class from a constructed type of , and how to override the protected methods of to provide custom behavior. 範例 1Example 1 下列程式碼範例示範的許多屬性和方法。The following code example demonstrates many of the properties and methods of . 程式碼範例會建立字串集合，使用方法，將數個字串，會顯示，並列出的字串。The code example creates a collection of strings, uses the method to add several strings, displays the , and lists the strings. 此範例會使用方法來尋找字串的索引和方法，以判斷字串是否在集合中。The example uses the method to find the index of a string and the method to determine whether a string is in the collection. 此範例會將字串使用使用預設值的方法，擷取和設定字串屬性 （C# 中為索引子）。The example inserts a string using the method and retrieves and sets strings using the default property (the indexer in C#). 此範例會移除字串的字串識別使用方法和索引使用方法。The example removes strings by string identity using the method and by index using the method. 最後，方法用來清除集合中的所有字串。Finally, the method is used to clear all strings from the collection. [!code-cpp[ObjectModel.Collection#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObjectModel.Collection/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ObjectModel.Collection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObjectModel.Collection/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ObjectModel.Collection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObjectModel.Collection/VB/source.vb#1)] 範例 2Example 2 下列程式碼範例示範如何從建構類型的衍生集合類別泛型類別，以及如何覆寫的受保護， ， ，和方法，以提供自訂行為， ， ，和方法，以及設定屬性。The following code example shows how to derive a collection class from a constructed type of the generic class, and how to override the protected , , , and methods to provide custom behavior for the , , , and methods, and for setting the property. 此範例中所提供的自訂行為是`Changed`結尾的每個受保護的方法所引發的通知事件。The custom behavior provided by this example is a `Changed` notification event that is raised at the end of each of the protected methods. `Dinosaurs`類別會繼承`Collection`(`Collection(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中)，並定義`Changed`事件，會使用`DinosaursChangedEventArgs`事件資訊，以及列舉來識別變更類型的類別。The `Dinosaurs` class inherits `Collection` (`Collection(Of String)` in Visual Basic) and defines the `Changed` event, which uses a `DinosaursChangedEventArgs` class for the event information, and an enumeration to identify the kind of change. 程式碼範例會呼叫數個屬性和方法示範自訂事件。The code example calls several properties and methods of to demonstrate the custom event. [!code-csharp[ObjectModel.CollectionInherited#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObjectModel.CollectionInherited/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ObjectModel.CollectionInherited#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObjectModel.CollectionInherited/VB/source.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 公用靜態 (在 Visual Basic 中) 這種類型的成員都具備執行緒安全。

span.span: Public static ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 不保證任何執行個體成員是安全執行緒。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: A可以支援多個讀取器同時，只要未修改集合。

span.span: A can support multiple readers concurrently, as long as the collection is not modified.

threadsafe.span: 即便如此，列舉集合在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。

span.span: Even so, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration.

threadsafe.span: 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。

span.span: To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization.

span.para: 這個基底類別可讓實作器建立的自訂收集更容易。實作者都來擴充這個而不是建立自己的基底類別。
This base class is provided to make it easier for implementers to create a custom collection. Implementers are encouraged to extend this base class instead of creating their own.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果物件使用預設建構函式建立，這個方法會決定使用的預設相等比較子的等號比較如`T`，清單中值的類型。If the object is created using the default constructor, this method determines equality using the default equality comparer for `T`, the type of values in the list. 如果型別`T`未實作介面，使用方法。If type `T` does not implement the interface, the method is used. 如果集合物件由傳遞物件建構函式，方法取決於介面使用物件。If the Collection object is created by passing an object to the constructor, the method will be determined by the interface used by that object. 這個方法會執行線性搜尋;因此，平均執行時間是成比例。This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to . 也就是說，這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是。That is, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is .

An for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `foreach` C# 語言的陳述式 (`for each` c + +`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 在這個位置上， 並未定義。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在讀取 的值之前，必須呼叫 以將列舉值前移至集合的第一個項目。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 。 returns the same object until is called. 會將 設定為下一個項目。 sets to the next element. 如果超過集合的列舉值的結尾會位於集合中的最後一個元素之後和傳回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 列舉值位於這個位置上，後續呼叫也會傳回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最後一個呼叫傳回`false`，是未定義。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 您不能再次將 設定為集合的第一個項目；您必須建立新的列舉值執行個體。You cannot set to the first element of the collection again; you must create a new enumerator instance instead. 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果對集合進行變更，例如加入、修改或刪除項目，列舉程式會永久失效，且其行為未定義。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 集合中的預設實作未同步處理。Default implementations of collections in are not synchronized. 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。This method is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 搜尋向前第一個項目開始和結束時間的最後一個元素。The is searched forward starting at the first element and ending at the last element. 這個方法會決定使用的預設相等比較子的等號比較如`T`，清單中值的類型。This method determines equality using the default equality comparer for `T`, the type of values in the list. 這個方法會執行線性搜尋;因此，平均執行時間是成比例。This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to . 也就是說，這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是。That is, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的許多屬性和方法。The following code example demonstrates many of the properties and methods of . 程式碼範例會建立字串集合，使用方法，將數個字串，會顯示，並列出的字串。The code example creates a collection of strings, uses the method to add several strings, displays the , and lists the strings. 此範例會使用方法來尋找字串的索引和方法，以判斷字串是否在集合中。The example uses the method to find the index of a string and the method to determine whether a string is in the collection. 此範例會將字串使用使用預設值的方法，擷取和設定字串屬性 （C# 中為索引子）。The example inserts a string using the method and retrieves and sets strings using the default property (the indexer in C#). 此範例會移除字串的字串識別使用方法和索引使用方法。The example removes strings by string identity using the method and by index using the method. 最後，方法用來清除集合中的所有字串。Finally, the method is used to clear all strings from the collection. remarks.format: ## Remarks 是在衍生類別中覆寫。The is meant to be overridden in a derived class. 若要插入的項目中的公用方法，請參閱。For a public method to insert an item in the , see . 接受`null`參考有效的值類型，並允許重複的項目。 accepts `null` as a valid value for reference types and allows duplicate elements. 如果`index`等於，`item`加入至結尾。If `index` is equal to , `item` is added to the end of . 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何從建構類型的衍生集合類別泛型類別，以及如何覆寫的受保護， ， ，和方法，以提供自訂行為， ， ，和方法，以及設定屬性。The following code example shows how to derive a collection class from a constructed type of the generic class, and how to override the protected , , , and methods to provide custom behavior for the , , , and methods, and for setting the property. 此範例中所提供的自訂行為是`Changed`結尾的每個受保護的方法所引發的通知事件。The custom behavior provided by this example is a `Changed` notification event that is raised at the end of each of the protected methods. `Dinosaurs`類別會繼承`Collection`(`Collection(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中)，並定義`Changed`事件，會使用`DinosaursChangedEventArgs`事件資訊，以及列舉來識別變更類型的類別。The `Dinosaurs` class inherits `Collection` (`Collection(Of String)` in Visual Basic) and defines the `Changed` event, which uses a `DinosaursChangedEventArgs` class for the event information, and an enumeration to identify the kind of change. 程式碼範例會呼叫數個屬性和方法示範自訂事件。The code example calls several properties and methods of to demonstrate the custom event. C# 語言使用關鍵字來定義索引，而不必實作屬性。The C# language uses the keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 會將 實作為預設屬性，這樣會提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality. 擷取這個屬性的值是 o （1） 運算。設定屬性，也是一種 o （1） 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation; setting the property is also an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的許多屬性和方法。The following code example demonstrates many of the properties and methods of . 程式碼範例會建立字串集合，使用方法，將數個字串，會顯示，並列出的字串。The code example creates a collection of strings, uses the method to add several strings, displays the , and lists the strings. 此範例會使用方法來尋找字串的索引和方法，以判斷字串是否在集合中。The example uses the method to find the index of a string and the method to determine whether a string is in the collection. 此範例會將字串使用使用預設值的方法，擷取和設定字串屬性 （C# 中為索引子）。The example inserts a string using the method and retrieves and sets strings using the default property (the indexer in C#). 此範例會移除字串的字串識別使用方法和索引使用方法。The example removes strings by string identity using the method and by index using the method. 最後，方法用來清除集合中的所有字串。Finally, the method is used to clear all strings from the collection. remarks.format: ## Remarks 唯讀的集合不允許在集合建立後增加、移除或修改項目。A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created. 是唯讀的集合是唯讀的集合只具有可防止修改集合的包裝函式因此，如果基礎集合進行變更，唯讀的集合會反映這些變更。A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes. 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

MemberSignature.Value: bool System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized { get; }
.property instance bool System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized
ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean Implements ICollection.IsSynchronized
property bool System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized { bool get(); };

summary.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the is synchronized (thread safe).

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the is synchronized (thread safe).

value.span: 如果 的存取為同步 (安全執行緒)，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if access to the is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, .

value.span: 在 的預設實作中，這個屬性一律會傳回 。

span.span: In the default implementation of , this property always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中的預設實作未同步處理。Default implementations of collections in are not synchronized. 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 傳回的物件，可用來同步處理存取具備。 returns an object that can be used to synchronize access to the . 同步處理的所有執行緒存取集合之前都鎖定這個物件時才有效。Synchronization is effective only if all threads lock this object before accessing the collection. 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

summary.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through a collection.

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through a collection.

returns.span: An that can be used to iterate through the collection.

span.span: An that can be used to iterate through the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `foreach` C# 語言的陳述式 (`for each` c + +`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也會將列舉值帶回至這個位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在這個位置上， 並未定義。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在讀取 的值之前，必須呼叫 以將列舉值前移至集合的第一個項目。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 或 。 returns the same object until either or is called. 會將 設定為下一個項目。 sets to the next element. 如果超過集合的列舉值的結尾會位於集合中的最後一個元素之後和傳回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 列舉值位於這個位置上，後續呼叫也會傳回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最後一個呼叫傳回`false`，是未定義。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要再次將 設定為集合的第一個元素，您可以在呼叫 之後，接著呼叫 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果對集合進行變更，例如加入、修改或刪除項目，列舉程式會永久失效，且其行為未定義。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 集合中的預設實作未同步處理。Default implementations of collections in are not synchronized. 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。This method is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有固定大小的集合不允許在集合建立後新增或移除項目，但允許對現有項目進行修改。A collection with a fixed size does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the collection is created, but it allows the modification of existing elements. 具有固定大小的集合是唯讀的集合只以防止新增或移除項目; 包裝函式因此，如果變更基礎的集合，包括新增或移除項目，固定大小的集合會反映這些變更。A collection with a fixed size is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents adding and removing elements; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, including the addition or removal of elements, the fixed-size collection reflects those changes. 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

C# 語言使用[這](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this.md)關鍵字定義索引，而不必實作屬性。The C# language uses the [this](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this.md) keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property.
